---
category: news
title: "Intel set to squeeze the flops out of Ponte Vecchio GPU"
excerpt: "Ponte Vecchio is Intel’s first serious run at delivering a high-performance GPU for AI/ML and HPC applications. The chip itself is actually a series of memory and compute dies glued together using a combination of Intel’s Foveros and EMIB packaging tech into a \"stack\" with two such stacks per accelerator."
publishedDateTime: 2022-08-23T19:50:00Z
